You can now preorder the Kurzgesagt Immune System book! “IMMUNE – A Journey into the Mysterious System That Keeps You Alive”: https://kgs.link/ImmuneBook
IMMUNE is a fascinating and fun journey through your own body, where we’ll be exploring mystery organs, murder universities, your enemies from viruses, bacteria and cancer (and how your immune system might have killed a cancer cell while you were reading the last few sentences) and the incredibly beautiful and amazing parts, cells and systems that keep you alive. After reading it you should not only gain a new appreciation for your own body but also experience disease differently. Also 45 illustrated pages by the Kurzgesagt team make the book very pretty.

Irreducibly complex molecular systems such as our immune response cannot evolve over vast periods of time. Without a fully intact and functioning immune system, the immunocompromised human race would have died off long before it ever had a chance to evolve. There is no such thing as a "simple" immune system, this is a complete contradiction of terms. It is the complexity of our human immune response that allowed the human race to survive our earliest beginnings; a less complex, incomplete immune system would have made us a terrible candidate for survival of the natural selection process. Unless we are supposed to believe that the indifferent, uncompromising natural selection process somehow had a kinder bias toward the human species? No, it is our theory of evolution that is entirely inadequate to explain how natural selection/survival-of-the-fittest didn't wipe out the human race while our immune response was in the earliest phases of it's development. Not even our most brilliant scientists can imagine an effective, yet super simple immune system. Prove me wrong.

The likelihood of this occurring "mindlessly" is unbelievably low, especially as the process becomes more unique to smaller populations like humans. Its not "random". That doesnt mean im saying its god, i'm just saying, none of this is "random".
There's an inherent emergent intelligence to all of this.
Perhaps the laws of chemistry, in the very foundations, have this intelligence built in, just by factor of how things combine and attract to create the emergence of intelligent systems (wether or not they are concious is irrelevant, they ACT as if there is intelligent purpose).
Either way, its stunning to contemplate.

So often, young students misinterpret evolutionary theory to mean everything is just a random accident. Thats not what it means. Nothing is random in a universe where chemistry has specific laws and rules. There's nothing random about hydrogen and oxygen combining to form water. It may be random WHEN they combine, but not the properties or ability TO combine. It's anything but random.

The Germans noticed the vast majority of their guns did basically no damage to the Soviet T-34 and KV, so they initiated a program to create the Tiger and Panther tanks to fit bigger guns that could kill the KV and T-34.

the Soviets, noticing the Germans had fit bigger and more dangerous guns onto their tanks and gun platforms, aswell as the tanks they have now themselves being effectively immune to Soviet guns, had initiated the T-34-85 and IS programs, with the 85 program being to fit the Soviet 85mm gun onto the T-34 (which is funny considering both the Tiger's and T-34-85's gun were originally Anti-aircraft guns that just so happened to be REALLY good at killing tanks) so that it could kill the new German heavies. And the IS program was meant to create the successor to the KV by making a new heavy tank that could resist the German long 75 and 88mm found on the Panther and Tiger respectively. This eventually resulted in the IS-2 which could resist German guns and packed one hell of a punch in the form of the 122mm D-25T anti-tank gun that could punch a hole effortlesslt through every tank the Germans had.

The Germans, however, noticing their new big cats were being destroyed effortlessly by Soviet IS-2's and T-34-85's, initiated a program to create even bigger tanks. This resulted in many prototypes and 2 vehicles that went into production: Tiger-2/Krönigs(King) Tiger and Jagdtiger. These were the biggest and heaviest tanks the Germans ever fielded, both being able to resist the Soviet 122mm. The King Tiger employed a slightly improved 88mm gun that could perforate the IS-2's armor at certain angles. The Jagdtiger, however, boasted a 128mm PaK 44 L/55 gun that could annihilate any Soviet tank from a great distance. However, only some 70-80 Jagdtigers were built compared to almost 4,000 IS-2's so it is easy to tell who won that competition... (infact, only 1.3k Tigers and some 500 King tigers were made. Meaning for each of the German heavies the Germans had, the Soviets had 2 IS-2's and a dozen T-34's.)

fact or fiction....A "virus" does not kill. The virus is a defensive response of the body.
But if the body keeps being bombarded with harmful radiation
(most of it microwaves, in our time) then the body will keep killing the
damaged cells. That is the Godgiven mission of a "virus": to kill cells
with damaged DNA. Why? Because otherwise the bad cells would divide and
multiply, with their harmful DNA. This is probably one of the causes of
tumors. This is also the problem with vaccines in general: They force your
body to produce antibodies before the "virus" has done its benificial
job with eliminating defective cells

Nice explanation of the alternative complement pathway. There’s also classical and MBL, as the video itself showed briefly. Also, C3a, C4a and C5a are deemed anaphylatoxins, with C5a being the most chemotactic. The complement system allows us greater immunity against Gram-negative bacteria (deficiencies make us more vulnerable) and its dysfunction is also implicated in primary GNs and SLE, possibly when the “brakes” you mentioned break due to several factors (a chief one being autoantibodies that signal complement in the classical route), so I appreciate this video for going over this important pathway.

For like the components of a factory or members of a palace or town, these beings support one another, stretch out their hands to assist one another, and answer the needs and requests of one another, saying: "Here I am, at your service!" Assisting one another, they work together in order. Joining efforts, they serve animate beings. Co-operating and turned a single goal, they obey an All-Wise Disposer. They conform to a rule of mutual assistance which is in force from the sun and moon, night and day, and winter and summer, to plants coming to the assistance of hungry and needy animals, and animals hastening to the assistance of weak, noble men, and even nutritious substances flying to assist delicate, weak infants and fruits, and particles of food passing to the assistance of the cells of the body. They show to anyone who is not altogether blind that they are acting through the strength of a single, most generous Nurturer, and at the command of a single most wise Disposer.
Thus, on the one hand this mutual support and assistance, this answering one another's needs, this mutual embracing, this subjugation, this order, testify decisively that beings are administered and organized by a single Disposer and are being impelled and directed by a single Nurturer. And on the other hand, this perfect grace within the universal wisdom to be seen plainly in the art of things; and the all-embracing mercy which shines within the providence; and the sustenance spread over that mercy and scattered so as to answer the needs of all living beings needy for sustenance; -these form a stamp of Divine unity so brilliant that anyone whose mind is not altogether extinguished will understand it and anyone who is not altogether blind will see it.
Yes, a veil of wisdom demonstrating intention, consciousness, and will, has covered the whole universe, and upon that veil of wisdom has been spread a veil of grace and favour exhibiting beneficence, adornment, embellishment, and benevolence; and over that adorned veil of favour a garment of mercy displaying flashes of making known and loved, of bestowal and the granting of gifts has enveloped the universe; and spread over that illuminated veil of universal mercy is a table of general provisions showing kindness and bestowal and benevolence and perfect compassion and fine nurturing and dominical favour.
Yes, all beings from particles to suns, whether individuals or species, or large or small, have been clothed in a magnificent shirt of wisdom embroidered with fruits and aims, benefits and purposes. And over the wisdom-displaying shirt, a garment of favour embroidered with flowers of grace and beneficence has been cut out in accordance with the stature of things; and over that ornamented garment of favour, a general table of sustenance has been set up, lit up with flashes of love, bestowal, affection, and the granting of gifts, to which the decorations of mercy have been attached, and which, together with bestowing those illuminated and jewel-encrusted decorations, is sufficient for all the groups of living beings on the face of the earth, and meets all their needs. Thus, this matter points to an All-Glorious Provider Who is All-Wise, All-Generous, and All-Compassionate, and shows Him as clearly as the sun.
Is that so? Is everything in need of sustenance?
Yes, like individual beings are in need of sustenance and all the necessities to continue their lives, we see that all the beings in the world, and especially living beings, whether universal or particular, wholes or parts, have many desires and needs, material and otherwise, for their existence, their lives, and the continuation of their lives. But their wants and needs are for such things that their hands cannot reach the least of them and their power is insufficient for the smallest of them. Yet, we see that all their wishes and material and immaterial sustenance is given to them From where he could not imagine, {[*]: Qur'an, 65:3.} from unhoped for places, with perfect order, at the appropriate time, in a suitable fashion, with perfect wisdom. And so, does this want and need of creatures and this manner of unseen help and assistance not show an All-Wise and Glorious Nurturer, an All-Compassionate Beauteous Disposer?

FIRST MATTER: In every facet of the motion of all particles the light of Divine unity shines like the sun. For as is proved briefly in the First Indication of the Tenth Word and in detail in the Twenty-Second Word, if every particle is not an official of God acting with His permission and under His authority, and if it is not undergoing change within His knowledge and power, then every particle must have infinite knowledge and limitless power; it must have eyes that see everything, a face that looks to all things, and authority over all things. For every particle of the elements acts, or can act, in an orderly fashion in all animate beings. But the order within things and laws according to which they are formed differ from one thing to the next. If their order was not known to the particles, the particles could not act, or even if they could act, they could not act without error. In which case, the particles which are performing their duties in beings are either acting with the permission and at the command, and within the knowledge and at the will, of the owner of an all-encompassing knowledge, or they themselves must have such an all-encompassing knowledge and power. Yes, all particles of air can enter the bodies of all animate beings, the fruits of all flowers, and the structures of all leaves. They can act within them, although the way the beings are formed is all different and their order and systems quite distinct. As though the factory of a fig was a loom for weaving cloth and the factory of a pomegranate, a machine for producing sugar, and so on; the programmes of their structures and bodies all differ from each other. A particle of air, then, enters or can enter all of them. It takes up its position and acts in a wise and masterly fashion without error. And on completion of its duty it departs. A mobile particle of mobile air, therefore, either must know the forms, shapes, measures, and formations with which plants and animals, and even fruits and flowers, are clothed, or else it must be an official acting under the command and will of one who does know. Similarly with a stationary particle of stationary earth: since it has the ability to be the means and place of cultivation for all the seeds of all flowering plants and fruit-bearing trees, either there must be in the particle itself or in the handful of soil that is its little house immaterial machinery and factories in good working order to the number of the varieties of the trees and plants, and flowers and fruits in fact, it is in every single particle that there must be a factory peculiar to it and all the equipment and machinery necessary for the running of the factory or else it must have a miraculous knowledge that knows all things about all things and a miracle-working power that creates everything from nothing; or, those duties are performed at the command and with the permission of One Who is Knowing of All Things, and through the power and might of One Who is Absolutely Powerful over All Things. If an untrained and inexperienced, common, ordinary, and blind man was to go to Europe and in all the factories there to work at all the trades and crafts in perfect and masterly fashion, and if he was to display a wise and artistic skill to such a degree that it left everyone speechless with amazement, anyone with a grain of consciousness would know that the man was not acting on his own initiative, but that a master of all trades was teaching him and causing him to work. And if there was a blind and impotent man who lived in a simple little house and was unable even to rise from his place, and if small fragments of stone, and bits and pieces of material like bone and cotton were to enter his little house and then sacks of sugar, bales of cloth, crates of jewelry, finely-made clothes encrusted with jewels, and delicious foods were to emerge, would anyone with a grain of intelligence not say: "That man is a wretched doorkeeper or merely a latch on the door of the factory of a wondrous miracle-working being, which is the source of his miracles"? In exactly the same way, the motion and duties of particles of air in plants and trees, and blossom and fruit, all of which are missives of the Eternally Besought One, antique dominical works of art, miracles of power, and wonders of wisdom, indicate that the particles are acting under the command and at the will of an All-Wise and Glorious Maker, an All-Generous and Beauteous Creator. Our protein's civilization is more advanced than our own
What I learned: I'm just a giant vessel for my proteins

Imagine you are just trying to find a nice place to raise a family. By sheer luck, you manage to find a place that seems inviting!

Now imagine that not only is this place an incomprehensibly vast complex of Saw or Cube level death traps, but that the traps draw in nightmarish shoggoth like creatures that will not only engulf and kill you, but use your DNA to make more deadly traps and more effective versions of the hunter killer projectiles hunting for your kind since before you got here to destroy your relatives with.

Now imagine that, at a scale literally beyond your understanding, beings billions of times more complex then you are are seeking out your natural predators, selectively breeding them to their will and preparing to unleash them by the countless trillions with the singular goal of annihilating your entire species from the region.

Said beings wield arcane understanding of the underpinnings of the universe you literally can not imagine to turn your own kind against you, and are perfectly willing to destroy sections of this place on a scale that you can't comprehend if it means you will die. These beings don't care about the collateral damage of other species caught up in their wide scale attacks, as long as it gets you. They're even working on making wholly alien materials animate and slaughter you. They never stop and do not consider your species a life form.

That's what anything entering a human body faces. It's only by sheer numbers and the brutal shaping of Darwinism that humans get sick at all. So basically: If you want Eldritch Horror, think of humans in the position of the bacteria here.

Sometimes it feels like your body's immune system is like a computer game being played over millions of years. Where you're like, playing Factorio and gradually optimizing various parts of your factory to deal with inefficencies or outside threats (biters attacking).
You get fucked by one thing, so you reform and implement a counter defence to that. And so on.
And if someone else just loads your savegame, they wont understand wtf is going on or what purpose the weird spaghetti serves. But it ALL serves a purpose, that only you as the creator understood over the millions of years you played the game.
Note i'm NOT a proponent of the simulation hypothesis (which itself is based on a serious logical fallacy), i'm merely comparing the immune system and how all the little parts work together, as a computer game you play for a very long time and make your own little solutions to a thousand problems.

Kurzgesagt, as far as I am aware, while C3a plays a role in chemotaxis of neutrophils, eosinophils and other mast cells, the attractor protein you were probably looking for is C5a, which plays a major role in the innate immune and inflammatory response and is responsible for attracting the relevant cells to the site of infection. C3a plays a role and is activated first, but you should have also mentioned C5a-C3a is also relevant for the adaptive immune system.

Excellent!  Very very informative, thanks :)

*Roles: *

Robotic soldiers: proteins
Messengers to warriors: antibodies
Civilians: cells. They use various mechanisms to not be accidentally attacked by a soldier
Invaders: bacteria, viruses etc.
Conquerors: virus
Warriors: immune cells

*Basic information *

There are 30 different types of soldiers
15 quintillion travel in every pathway of the land

*Uses of the system: *
Cripples enemies
Activates immune system
Rips out holes in invaders until dead

*Mechanics *

The soldiers randomly drift in the pathways with no direction or will, but that is the strategy
They are passive until they are alerted then they load their weapons or get equipped
One aware soldier will pass the message to the next then the receiver does the same and so on

*Scenario #1 *

Invaders are infiltrate the land

C3 will alert others. C3 is randomly alerted either through other soldiers attacking the enemies or messengers like antibodies.

C3 has a special arm that separates and becomes an independent missile called ‘C3b’. The original C3 is C3a.

C3b hunts bacteria, fungi or viruses. It has little time to find its victim (real time fraction of a second) before it loses energy (neutralized by water molecules). If C3b is successful, it latches itself onto an invader’s vehicle. Then it changes its shape to attract other soldiers. It changes its shape many times then.

Finally, it forms a recruiting platform that activates more C3 soldiers. Eventually, many recruiting platforms are made following the same steps and the invaders and their vehicles are covered with many soldiers that can cripple, slow down and even make the invader helpless. However, this is not enough to stop them.

Meanwhile, C3a becomes a messenger and thousands of these messengers run away from the battle scene to alert others for help. Stronger soldiers or warriors hear their screams and follow them back to the battle site. The more messengers they see, the more aggressive they become.

These strong soldiers start killing the enemy. The first warriors to arrive are trolls (phagocytes). They swallow the enemies, trap the invaders in a prison within them then kill with acid. However, trolls have a lousy grip as they are so large. Fortunately, the recruiting platforms latched onto the bacteria assists in helping the trolls grip.

The shape of the recruiting platform changes again (from C3 convertase to C5 convertase) and recruits new robot soldiers.

Together, these new soldiers construct a bigger structure called The Membrane Attack Complex. Long spears anchor themselves deep into the earth of the structure until a hole is ripped that cannot be closed.

Gushing water escapes the hole and drown the invader, the pressure of the water flooding their insides and causing it to explode out. This causes them to bleed to death.

The surviving invaders are wounded and tired and distracted from fighting the small soldiers. Taking advantage of the distractions, they are quickly eliminated by arriving warriors.

The civilians did not even notice all of the commotion because the job was done so quick.

*Scenario #2 *

Conquerors instead of plain enemies

Conquerors looking for as much as land that they could occupy. Outside of land, they are mindlessly hoping to bump into a castle with just pure luck.

With no castles or habitable places around, they are defenseless as they do not have any hosts. The foot soldiers easily cripple them and cut their defenses, guiding the warriors to the conquerors.

*Scenario #3 *

A formidable and fearsome conqueror has come (vaccinia virus)

When it steps foot on a kingdom, it forces it to send a soldier to dismiss all robot soldiers.
Now the conqueror easily creates safe zones around occupied castles. When it destroys castles and attempt to conquer more, it is more likely to be successful.

*Scenario #4 *

An enemy that hides well and is undetectable

Some invaders can camouflage themselves using civilians to keep the robotic soldiers calm as they go unnoticed . They are capable of more damage.




NOTE: I know this analogy is a tad faulty and bizarre so I would appreciate feedback and ways to improve it. Hope it helps!

The complement system bombs intruders, but it may not be effective against all microbes. In fact, it can even help HIV spread. Having the complement proteins bind the HIV helps the virus interact with the white blood cells that it needs to infect. The macrophages and other unsuspecting white blood cells try to destroy the complement covered HIV but get infected in the process.


HIV's sneakiness doesn't end there. HIV is a retrovirus, which is a virus type that combines its genome with ours. They don't just infect a cell; they become part of that cell. We have lots of ancient retrovirus DNA in our cells from infections that plagued our ancestors. The viral DNA of these infections is mostly non-functional, but there are ancient viral proteins still active in us. One such protein is critical in the development of our placenta and infection by this retrovirus millions of years ago probably gave rise to placental mammals.

So what happens when you get Sepsis? Asking because I'm recovering from it (thankfully). Contracted it after surgery, luckily the nurses/docs caught it early avoided me going into Septic Shock

To my best understanding, it's an overreaction of the body's immune system to a relatively tame bacterium entering the bloodstream (which is meant to be a sterile environment).

Body temp & heart rate goes through the roof. Blood pressure begins to drop making me susceptible to organ failure, stroke etc. The body literally begins to burn itself out to death.

I was pumped with drips and antibiotics until my inflammation markers lowered and all the above turned to normal.

I gathered it's a race against time to destroy the bacterium quicker before the body kills itself. Drips are there to keep blood pressure up since the heart needs water to pump blood more efficiently.

This is what my understanding is based on what I was told whilst I was hospitalised. I know it's a slight digression from the video but I'm just curious to see if my understanding is solid enough.

What if we made bacteriophages part of our immune system? Since they replicate themselves, we'd only need to store one copy of it somewhere. Then, when the body is overwhelmed with bacteria, all we have to do is let it out of storage. They can't affect us, so they'll wipe out all the bacteria in our system. Then, when the last bacterium is dead, they'll go back to their passive mode and can be reabsorbed by the body. A sort of symbiosis, if you will. We'll already doing it with bacteria. Why not extend it to viruses too?

Ok

The complement system is vital against virus infections, which can be very difficult for the body to combat. Viruses get inside our cells, and they hijack the cellular machinery for their use, and in some cases can avoid detection by staying silent inside the cells. Interestingly, not all virus infections lead to bad outcomes.


One particularly fascinating virus type are retroviruses, that can cut and paste their genome inside ours. We have lots of ancient, non-working retrovirus genomes inside our cells leftover from infections long gone. Retroviruses can cause devastating illnesses like AIDS, but in some cases we have used the integrated retrovirus genes for our own use. In fact, a retrovirus infection millions of years ago likely initiated the evolution of all placental mammals.

My name is Yoshikage Kira. I'm 33 years old. My house is in the northeast section of Morioh, where all the villas are, and I am not married. I work as an employee for the Kame Yu department stores, and I get home every day by 8 PM at the latest. I don't smoke, but I occasionally drink. I'm in bed by 11 PM, and make sure I get eight hours of sleep, no matter what. After having a glass of warm milk and doing about twenty minutes of stretches before going to bed, I usually have no problems sleeping until morning. Just like a baby, I wake up without any fatigue or stress in the morning. I was told there were no issues at my last check-up. I'm trying to explain that I'm a person who wishes to live a very quiet life. I take care not to trouble myself with any enemies, like winning and losing, that would cause me to lose sleep at night. That is how I deal with society, and I know that is what brings me happiness. Although, if I were to fight I wouldn't lose to anyone.

I was literally revising immunology all day and my favorite Youtube channel uploads a video on Immunology!

The complement system is vital against virus infections, which can be very difficult for the body to combat. Viruses get inside our cells, and they hijack the cellular machinery for their use, and in some cases can avoid detection by staying silent inside the cells. Interestingly, not all virus infections lead to bad outcomes.


One particularly fascinating virus type are retroviruses, that can cut and paste their genome inside ours. We have lots of ancient, non-working retrovirus genomes inside our cells leftover from infections long gone. Retroviruses can cause devastating illnesses like AIDS, but in some cases we have used the integrated retrovirus genes for our own use. In fact, a retrovirus infection millions of years ago likely initiated the evolution of all placental mammals.

A tiny clarification, I'm a physician but not a specialist in immunology. However I quite clearly remember the membrane attack complex unfortunately is only efficient against a tiny handful of bacteria. Namely the Neisseria genus. Almost all other bacteria are completely immune against the membrane attack complex. So even though it sounds cool as heck, most bacteria don't even get fazed by it. :(


This has been proven by people who have genetic problems in their complement system which ONLY affect the membrane attack complex, but they still do not show any problem defending against almost any pathogen, except the Neisseria genus, which causes gonorrhoea and meningitis, mostly.

Kurzgesagt: Tiny Bombs in your Blood

When gluten proteins get into my digestive system my immune system is triggered to attack my small intestine, which damages it and makes it difficult to absorb nutrients from food. This can lead to long term health complications. The complement system in my body that triggers these antibodies, as l understand it, can also partially lock on to proteins from milk, potatoes (but not sweet potatoes) and corn if I consume enough of them, known as cross reactivity. Recently my immune system pretty much killed of insulin producing cells in my pancreas so my body is no longer able to break down glucose in the bloodstream, which means I have to inject externally sourced insulin to stay alive. Once things like this happen your body cannot unlearn it. So eat healthy, maintain a healthy gut and a healthy lifestyle if you don't want to risk things like that happening to you.

I sometimes think about how I am just a cluster of smaller thing, themselves clusters of a multitude of smaller things, etc etc. I am a chaotic groupment which outputs semi-chaotic behavior and all that is "ME at this moment" is a complex dance of a multitude of tiny pieces. My thoughts are but a rendition, an illustration, of what is happening inside my brain and my decisions are actually just the conclusion of numerous tiny interactions caused by inner and outer forces.

If that's all I am and there is no invisible/untouchable soul-like thing, then what is the "ME" who is writting this youtube comment ? Do I even have free will ? Is writting this youtube comment just what was always gonna happen based on what happened to me and inside of me ?

When I think about it, it makes me extremely excited, interested, but also very uneasy, frustrated and it fills me with existential dread. That's why I prefer to think that "Free will" is a thing, that it means that "ME" is allowed to output any thought or action without an exterior force subverting my inner thought processes with the intent of diverting it from its original conclusion.
"ME at this moment" is the entirety of my body (i.e. all of what contribute to my inner processes directly) (e.g. when I am drunk, the alcohol molecules directly divert what the conclusion would have been, so the alcohol is a part of "ME at this moment")

Finally, "ME" is the entirety of every "ME at this moment" that ever existed until now. I also like to think that all the "ME at this moment" that will ever happen are also part of "ME" thus making all of the potential future "ME at this moment" important as well.

Well, thanks for reading and I hope I did not bore you ! Obviously this view of what we are is a personal one and I have no idea how accurate it is, so please don't attack me, but please challenge or add to my view if you like and please describe yours. I am very interested in this topic and further data is always nice to have when you try to find out what is true. Cheers :)

Even though it's not presented that way, I think this video hints at one of the most compelling cases in favor of evolution.

It is a hugely elaborate and massively complex system but each of the constituent pieces are incredibly simple and were created in response to a specific environmental condition. It also relies on insane amounts of randomness but balances that with being a self-regulating system to ramp production up and down without a central control mechanism. It even provides an example of how evolution can select for obviously self-detrimental ideas because sometimes it's useful in a system to make stuff with a goal of dying so long as it does certain other interactions along the way.

One Cuil = One level of abstraction away from the reality of a situation.

Example: You ask me for a Hamburger.

1 Cuil: if you asked me for a hamburger, and I gave you a raccoon.

2 Cuils: If you asked me for a hamburger, but it turns out I don't really exist. Where I was originally standing, a picture of a hamburger rests on the ground.

3 Cuils: You awake as a hamburger. You start screaming only to have special sauce fly from your lips. The world is in sepia.

4 Cuils: Why are we speaking German? A mime cries softly as he cradles a young cow. Your grandfather stares at you as the cow falls apart into patties. You look down only to see me with pickles for eyes, I am singing the song that gives birth to the universe.

5 Cuils: You ask for a hamburger, I give you a hamburger. You raise it to your lips and take a bite. Your eye twitches involuntarily. Across the street a father of three falls down the stairs. You swallow and look down at the hamburger in your hands. I give you a hamburger. You swallow and look down at the hamburger in your hands. You cannot swallow. There are children at the top of the stairs. A pickle shifts uneasily under the bun. I give you a hamburger. You look at my face, and I am pleading with you. The children are crying now. You raise the hamburger to your lips, tears stream down your face as you take a bite. I give you a hamburger. You are on your knees. You plead with me to go across the street. I hear only children's laughter. I give you a hamburger. You are screaming as you fall down the stairs. I am your child. You cannot see anything. You take a bite of the hamburger. The concrete rushes up to meet you. You awake with a start in your own bed. Your eye twitches involuntarily. I give you a hamburger. As you kill me, I do not make a sound. I give you a hamburger.

6 Cuils: You ask me for a hamburger. My attempt to reciprocate is cut brutally short as my body experiences a sudden lack of electrons. Across a variety of hidden dimensions you are dismayed. John Lennon hands me an apple, but it slips through my fingers. I am reborn as an ocelot. You disapprove. A crack echoes through the universe in defiance of conventional physics as cosmological background noise shifts from randomness to a perfect A Flat. Children everywhere stop what they are doing and hum along in perfect pitch with the background radiation. Birds fall from the sky as the sun engulfs the earth. You hesitate momentarily before allowing yourself to assume the locus of all knowledge. Entropy crumbles as you peruse the information contained within the universe. A small library in Phoenix ceases to exist. You stumble under the weight of everythingness, Your mouth opens up to cry out, and collapses around your body before blinking you out of the spatial plane. You exist only within the fourth dimension. The fountainhead of all knowledge rolls along the ground and collides with a small dog. My head tastes sideways as spacetime is reestablished, you blink back into the corporeal world disoriented, only for me to hand you a hamburger as my body collapses under the strain of reconstitution. The universe has reasserted itself. A particular small dog is fed steak for the rest of its natural life. You die in a freak accident moments later, and you soul works at the returns desk for the Phoenix library. You disapprove. Your disapproval sends ripples through the inter-dimensional void between life and death. A small child begins to cry as he walks toward the stairway where his father stands.

7 Cuils: I give you a hamburger. The universe is engulfed within itself. A bus advertising hotdogs drives by a papillon. It disapproves. An unnatural force reverses Earth's gravity. You ask for a hamburger. I reciprocate with a mildly convulsing potato. You disapprove. Your disapproval releases a cosmic shift in the void between birth and life. You ask for a hamburger. A certain small dog feasts on hamburger patties for the rest of its unnatural, eternal endurance. Your constant disapproval sends silence through everything. A contrived beast becomes omnipotent. You ask for a hamburger. I give you a hamburger your body becomes an unsettled blob of nothingness, then divides by three. The papillon barks. The universe realigns itself. You, the papillon, and the hamburger disapprove. This condemnation stops the realignment. Hades freezes over. A pig is launched is launched into the unoccupied existence between space and time with a specific hamburger. You ask for a hamburger. I give you a hamburger. It screams as you lift it to your face. You laugh maniacally as I plead with you. You devour the hamburger as it pleads for mercy. I disapprove and condemn you to an eternity in a certain void where a certain pig and its specific hamburger are located. The Universal Space-time Continuum Committee disapproves of my irrational decision. You are locked away and are fed hamburgers for the rest of your natural existence. A pickle refuses to break down during the process of digestion. You die in a freak accident. A certain pickle lives the rest of its life in a comatose state. Your soul disapproves. Down the street a child cries as a hamburger gets stuck in, and climbs back up, her esophagus. You ask again for a hamburger. I refuse to reciprocate. You demand a lawyer. I remind you harshly that this is the new world order. Lawyers no longer exist. Only papillons. Your name is written on a list of sins. Blasphemy. You ask for a hamburger. The comatose pickle vanquishes your soul from this universe. Realignment occurs. You beg for a hamburger. A certain papillon's name is written on an obelisk in Egypt. Mumble. Peasants worship the obelisk. Your soulless corpse partakes in the festivity. Hamburgers are banned universally. The sun implodes. All planets cease to have ever existed. Mercury. Venus. Earth. Mars. Jupiter. Saturn. Uranus. Neptune. Pluto is the only mass in existence. Conveniently, you are on vacation here. Your need for hamburgers re-establishes space-time.
